song_lyrics: Ānand chhāyo... Mangal chhāyo...
Ānand chhāyo... Mangal chhāyo...
Umang antarmā chhalakāyo...
Puṇya kamāvā avasar āvyo, ānand ānand mangal chhāyo,
Puṇya kamāvā avasar āvyo, ānand ānand mangal chhāyo,
Āyo re āyo re āyo āyo re, mangal avasar āj,
Āyo re āyo re āyo āyo re, mangal avasar āj... 1
Uttarāyaṇnā puṇya parvamā, Pramukh Swāmīne rājī karavā,
Uttarāyaṇnā puṇya parvamā, Mahant Swāmīne rājī karavā;
Avasar amolakh āyo re, avasar amulakh āyo re,
Āyo re āyo re āyo āyo re, mangal avasar āj,
Āyo re āyo re āyo āyo re, mangal avasar āj.... 2
Swāminārāyaṇ pragaṭ birāje, dān grahe sukh devā kāje,
Karmā jhoḷī grahī Shrī Harie, Guṇātītānand sange re,
Ālek de chhe...
Swāminārāyaṇ hare Sachchidānand Prabho!
Swāminārāyaṇ hare Sachchidānand Prabho!
Ālek de chhe āngaṇ āvī, jhoḷī bharatā sau harakhāī,
Antar umang chhavāyo, antar umang chhavāyo re,
Āyo re āyo re āyo āyo re, mangal avasar āj,
Āyo re āyo re āyo āyo re, mangal avasar āj... 3
Ghar ghar faratā jhoḷī laīne, Shāstrījī Mahārāj,
Gagan chūmatā mandir bāndhyā, upāsanāne kāj,
Gāme gāme jhoḷī māngī Jogīe, mandiro chalāvyā,
Pramukh Swāmīe saunā jīvamā, satsang dīp pragaṭāvyā,
Akṣhar-Puruṣhottamno mahimā desh videsh felāyo,
Āyo re āyo re āyo āyo re, mangal avasar āj.
Āyo re āyo re āyo āyo re, mangal avasar āj.
Kaṇ daī anant levānu ṭāṇu, āngaṇ āvyu āj,
Ālek de chhe sanmukh āvī Pramukh Swāmī Maharāj,
Ālek de chhe sanmukh āvī Mahant Swāmī Maharāj,
Mālik saunā ek ja e chhe, saunā poṣhaṇ-hār,
Jhoḷī Sahajānandnī ghūme, sāt samandar pār... 4
Jhoḷī chhalakāvī daīe re, denāro mānge chhe dān,
Enu dīdhelu daīe pāchhu, tan man dhan ne dān,
Man mūkīne daīe āje, tajī mamat abhimān,
Akṣhardhāme javāne kāje, paravāno ame pāyo re,
Paravāno ame pāyo re pāyo re pāyo re,
Pāyo re pāyo re mangal avasar āj,
Āyo re āyo re āyo āyo re, mangal avasar āj.
Āyo re āyo re āyo āyo re, mangal avasar āj....
title: Āyo re āyo re mangal avasar āj

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1239: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Utsavna Pad
